Module com.bankinggui
Package bankingsoftware

Class CollegeChecking

java.lang.Object
bankingsoftware.Account
bankingsoftware.Checking
bankingsoftware.CollegeChecking
public class CollegeChecking extends Checking
College Checking class that extends savings. It has its own interest fee, no monthly fee and has campus locations
Author:
Frances Cortuna
